    • Method Detail

      • setUserAgent

        public void setUserAgent(java.lang.String agent)
        Set the value to set as the user agent header on every request created. Specifying a null or empty agent parameter will reset this client to use the default user agent header value.
        Parameters:
        agent -

      • getUserAgent

        public java.lang.String getUserAgent()
        Get the set user agent
        Returns:
        The set user agent

      • sendGetRequest

        public java.lang.String sendGetRequest(java.lang.String url)
        Sends a GET request to supplied URL. Converts the input stream as received from the server to string.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to send the GET request to.
        Returns:
        The HTTP response string as returned from the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
